revised_title: The Impact of Diabetogenic Pituitary Extracts on Pancreatic Islets in Dogs
tldr: The study investigates the effects of diabetogenic anterior pituitary extracts on the islets of Langerhans in dogs. The experiments show that these extracts can cause significant damage to the islets, leading to a permanently diabetic condition. The researchers also observe changes in the duct epithelium and the acinar tissue of the pancreas. The findings contribute to the understanding of diabetes and its potential treatments.
